attributes.action: build cities well-away from London and to offer incentives for people to live / work there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Build cities in geographical parts of the UK (outside the South-east of England) that are depopulated, deprived or under-developed. Offer financial and tax incentives for UK citizens already living there, and offer attractive incentives for others to relocate, live and work in and set up businesses in these areas. Possible sites for development of cities could be Ullapool / Thurso in the Scottish Highlands, Penzance in Cornwall, Pembroke or Aberyswyth in Wales, or Sunderland or Burrow in Furness in England.
